participant_1.background:
I prefer to work with my hands and build things.
I just got back from visiting my cousins and pets in the country.
I enjoy spending hours in the local coffee shop people watching.
I'm going to make my grandson a chocolate cake and brew a batch of beer.
I run and play frisbee with my dog.

participant_2.background:
I spill my Coke all the time when I'm talking.
i am a weightlifter.
I want to learn more about how to overcome my fears and live a more fulfilling life.
I go to nature documentaries to feel like I'm experiencing nature without being limited by my disability.
I'm keeping it professional at work and focused on my studies.

content.text: Good morning! How has your day been?
It's going great! I just got back from weightlifting. I'm really into fitness and wellness.
That's great! I like to run and play frisbee with my dog.
That's really fun! I do a lot of hiking and backpacking with my friends.
I've always wanted to go backpacking but I've been too busy.
You should definitely do it! It's a great way to see nature and spend time with your friends.
I know I will! I'm just waiting for the weather to get warmer.
That's a good idea. It's definitely more enjoyable when the weather is nice.
So what else do you like to do?
I love to watch nature documentaries. I feel like I'm experiencing nature without being limited by my disability.
That's really interesting! I've never thought of it that way.
Yeah, it's a great way to learn more about the world around us.
I'm going to have to check that out.
You definitely should! It's really cool.
